provenance: Kate Butler Peterson, St. Paul; given to MIA, 2000.
text: Otto Dix’s satiric images savaged Germany’s upper middle class, laying bare depravity and hypocrisy. Neither Venus nor Cupid satisfied the needs of this society; here the matchmaker is a procuress, a brothel madam.
title: The Procuress
